author: ate
msg: Centralizing all DecoratorAction creation for Page and Portlet level actions using the PageActionAccess component
to the DecorationValve, thus removing all legacy usage thereof from the JetspeedPowerTool.
Furthermore, added Page "edit" state management using the new PageEditAccess features of PageActionAccess.

author: ate
msg: Creating a PageActionAccess component and storing it in the session is now centralized and done only by the ProfilerVavle,
right after the page has been resolved.

author: ate
msg: Javadoc corrections to reflect that the DecoratorAction has moved package.

author: ate
msg: Enhancing PageActionAccess with the new Page "edit" state component interface.
Also moving it together with the related DecoratorAction class to the decoration package.
